title: Sexual orientation of Americans in 2013
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Sexual Orientations for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Straight and Men had the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
In Sexual Orientation Straight, Women had the highest Share of respondents among all 3 Sexual Orientations and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
The maximum Share of respondents for Women that was found in Sexual Orientation Straight was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Sexual Orientations on X-axis for 2 groups Women, and Men. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Straight and Men had the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Sexual Orientations for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Men had the highest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Straight and Men had the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
In Sexual Orientation Straight, Women had the highest Share of respondents among all 3 Sexual Orientations and it has the lowest Share of respondents in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
The maximum Share of respondents for Women that was found in Sexual Orientation Straight was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 3 different Sexual Orientations for 2 groups Women, and Men that are presented on the X-axis.
Sexual Orientation Straight had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Men. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual for Men.
In Sexual Orientation Straight, Women had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Sexual Orientation Bisexual out of all 3 Sexual Orientations.
The maximum Share of respondents for Women that was found in Sexual Orientation Straight was 108.56 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Sexual Orientation Bisexual.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of Women.
Averaging all 2 groups Women, and Men, the Sexual Orientation Straight is the maximum Share of respondents and Bisexual is the minimum Share of respondents.
